# setFontPanelFactory(_:)

**Type Method**

Sets the class that creates the shared Font panel object.

## Declaration

```swift
class func setFontPanelFactory(_ factoryId: AnyClass?)
```

## Parameters

- **factoryId**: The new font panel factory class, which should be a subclass of `NSFontPanel`.

## Discussion

Call this method before accessing the Font panel in any way, such as in your app delegate’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplicationDelegate/applicationWillFinishLaunching(_:)] method.

## Changing the Default Font Conversion Classes

- **setFontManagerFactory(_:)**: Sets the class that creates the shared font manager object.
